prompt: Image Prompt: Create a mystical and ethereal depiction of an empty tomb at dawn, bathed in soft, golden light streaming through the entrance. The tomb should be carved from ancient stone, adorned with intricate details. Surround the scene with blooming flowers and fluttering butterflies, symbolizing rebirth and resurrection. Include subtle rays of light illuminating the interior of the tomb, hinting at a divine presence. Capture the solemn yet hopeful atmosphere of this sacred moment, evoking a sense of wonder and awe.
